entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Generate error message when createdump is missing or does not have executable permissions #87352
    8.0.0
  • Provide a clean migration experience from built-in COM to source-generated COM #87350
  • Fix-all for ConvertComImportToGeneratedComInterface experience UX deficiencies #87347
  • Unable to publish NativeAOT project for linux-bionic-arm64 #87340
  • Optimize the iteration over all registers in various places in LSRA #87337
    Future
  • Symbols are not correctly indexed for 6.0.16 Sytem.Collections.dll #87334
  • osx-arm64 packs subset build break #87333
  • [API Proposal]: Add extension method AsReadOnly() for ICollection<T> #87330
  • System.Net.Mail.Functional.Tests work item crash with Mono on Linux x64 #87327
  • GC Gen size counters don't show on Linux in native AOT #87325
    8.0.0
  • Increased variance in some benchmark tests #87324
    8.0.0
  • Unable to clean up running docker containers #87323
  • [browser][debugger][MT] CallFunctionOnTests.RunOnInvalidCfoId #87315
    8.0.0
  • [browser][debugger][MT] PropertiesSortedByProtectionLevel #87314
    8.0.0
  • Add support of Samsung netcoredbg for mono runtime. #87312
  • WindowsServiceLifetime.ServiceName is empty in NET6 #87309
  • outerloop crossgen2 access violation in jit.opt workitem #87305
    8.0.0
  • Rejit test failures in outerloop - unexpected counts #87300
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Interop source generators and analyzers should use HashCode.Combine to implement GetHashCode #86104
    8.0.0
  • Microsoft DI resolves enumerables incorrectly when a matching ServiceType has already been resolved #87017
  • NAOT dwarfdump has more warnings than expected #87321
  • attempting to use AOT on 32 bit should give specific error #84583
    8.0.0
  • Porting X509Certificate2.MatchesHostname to Net6 #87341
  • Test failure GC/Scenarios/NDPin/ndpinfinal/ndpinfinal.sh #86853
    8.0.0
  • Test failure global::JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.X86._Avx1.Program.RoundToNearestIntegerSingle() #83075
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Collections.CreateAddAndClear<Int32> #79102
    8.0.0
  • Regressions from early liveness pass #80743
    8.0.0
  • [FullPGO] Regressions in LinqBenchmarks due to delegate GDV #77041
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: Regressions in System.MathBenchmarks.Double #80359
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Tests.Perf_String #72026
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in Span.Sorting #78179
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Numerics.Tests.Perf_Plane #70497
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Numerics.Tests.Perf_Vector3 #82102
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Remove struct constraint from `Vector*<T>` #85893
    8.0.0
  • Test failure readytorun\\determinism\\crossgen2determinism\\crossgen2determinism #84752
  • Follow up feedback with logging source generator #52549
    8.0.0
  • DateTime "MMM" format is inconsistent for June, July, September if day is also part of format #87307
  • FOH (Frozen Object Heap) work items #76151
    8.0.0
  • [JIT] BinaryWriter.Write(int) codegen is unexpectedly suboptimal #56745
    8.0.0
  • revise how we pass config settings to benchmarkdotnet for SPMI collections #86410
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 15 Regressions on 5/27/2023 12:14:23 AM #86905
    8.0.0
  • Test System.Net.Sockets.Tests.*.SendRecvPollSync_TcpListener_Socket(listenAt: ::1, pollBeforeOperation: True) failed in CI. #1479
    8.0.0
  • Injected service is of wrong type when registered multiple times with generic registration - Microsoft.Extensions.DependecyInjection #79938
    8.0.0
  • Dynamic PGO startup improvements in NET 8 #76969
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Threading.Tests.Perf_Lock #79408
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Net.NetworkInformation.Tests.PhysicalAddressTests on 2/19/2023 #82442
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 2 Regressions on 3/2/2023 6:22:31 PM #83218
    8.0.0
  • Regression in System.Collections.Concurrent.IsEmpty.Queue #84790
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Collections.CreateAddAndRemove #83738
    8.0.0
  • System.Buffers.Binary.Tests.BinaryReadAndWriteTests #83735
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Net.Tests.Perf_WebUtility #84140
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Tests.Perf_Guid #85994
    8.0.0
  • Regression on INTEL machines with TechEmpower Fortunes #86113
    8.0.0
  • Performance of my Maze Generator went from 2.1 seconds to 3.8 after upgrading to .NET 7.0 #78110
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Resource manager tests failing with MissingMethodException : No parameterless constructor defined for type #87303
  • Analyzer and Code-Fix to enable easy adoption of `[GeneratedComInterface]` #86343
    8.0.0
  • Cannot create environment variable for logging category with periods #87130
  • Regressions in System.Collections.Tests.Perf_BitArray #85472
    8.0.0
  • System.Net.Requests.Tests, System.Net.Security.Tests failing with `Segmentation fault` on Debian 10 #87268
  • Dotnet publish command creates publish folder locally but not in the Azure pipelines. #85147
  • *.comhost.dll support arm64x #85291

PullRequests

Created

  • Tweak dotnet-pgo to be flexible to changes from class to valuetype for application types #87355
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix validation on build #87354
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Crossgen2 name mangling issue with MethodWithToken #87353
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Move System.Transactions.Local over to using source-generated COM instead of built-in COM whenever possible. #87351
    area-System.Transactions
  • update snap authoring for June and resolve segfaults #87349
    area-Snap
  • Clean up code, use DiagnosticInfo in LibraryImportGenerator, Cache well known attribute types in StubEnvironment #87348
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [IGNORE][wasm] testing wbt+sdk #87345
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Allow bigger json parsing to JsonDocument #87343
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Mark GeneratedComClass code as generated #87342
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Disable mark list optimization if we hit a per region mark list overflow (#86508) #87339
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Update debugging-vscode.md #87338
    area-Meta
  • Add IStartupHostedService #87335
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Bump HandleHistogram32::SIZE to 16 #87332
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Simplify ManagedWebSocket.ApplyMask #87331
    area-System.Net
  • Optimize zero-byte receives on ManagedWebSocket #87329
    area-System.Net
  • [QUIC] Fix rooted connection when hanshake failed #87328
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [draft][browser][MT] ConfigureAwait(false) ignored when JSSynchronizationContext is installed #87326
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Shrink ManifestEnvelope.MaxChunkSize to hold extended data #87322
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [WIP] HttpClientHandler request metrics #87319
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use optimized Index.GetOffset in Range.GetOffsetAndLength #87317
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [RISC-V] Fix Stubs for Generics #87316
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • WIP don't set mark array bits during concurrent marking and do more frequent BGCs #87311
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Fix errors in vm #87310
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Make virtual delegate targets less costly #87308
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • Use HashCode.Combine() in interop source generators and analyzers instead of custom GetHashCode implementations #87221
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Incremental mibc merge #87336
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Update to use the cbl-mariner webassembly images. #86806
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure
  • Add marshalling tests and warn if interface is not partial #87146
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • JIT: Reorder physical promotion and forward sub #87265
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix ndpinfinal test with JitStress #87320
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Removing the struct/unmanaged constraint from the Vector types #87283
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/6.0-staging] Fix creating cultures with extensions in the name #87177
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Globalization, 6.0.x
  • JIT: Fix gtGetClassHandle with commas #87313
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add newly introduced modifiers to our csharp_preferred_modifier_order editorconfig #86668
    area-Meta
  • Crossgen2 determinism fix and stress mode #87302
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Revise how we set tiering and pgo options for spmi benchmark collections #87292
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Don't publish wixpacks #87222
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Assign correct slots during IEnumerable resolution #80410
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • [wasi] make console always redirected #87278
    area-System.Console, os-wasi, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] [mono][aot] Generate 'native-indirect' wrappers in full-aot mode. #86934
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.x
  • Disable Quic_IsSupportedTests against ActiveIssue #87306
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Set PublishTrimmed in NativeAOT targets #87304
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Ensure that Vector<T> is tracked as "optimistic" for crossgen2 #87240
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add analyzers and code-fixes to help adoption of source-generated COM #87223
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 8.0.0
  • Bump the max Dwarf warning limit #87301
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Generate debug info even if managed debug info not present #87251
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove some dead code that threw file load exception #87290
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Delete Debian 10 test runs #87288
    area-System.Net
  • Fix typo in dac-notes.md #87295
    area-Meta, community-contribution

Updated

  • [NativeAOT] ThreadStatics part 2 #87148
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Warn in CustomMarshallerAnalyzer if the MarshaMode is not valid #87198
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2197698 #87296
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [ComInterfaceGenerator] Warn on visibility of interface and StringMarshallingCustomType #87065
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Adapt Tarjan generic cycle detector for use in Crossgen2 #71426
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Upgrading SpanHelpers with Vector512 #86655
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Improve the performance of the type loader through various tweaks #85743
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Add JIT support for the methods in Vector128<T> on amd64. #86546
    NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [CoreCLR] `UnsafeAccessorAttribute` non-generic support #86932
    area-VM-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • SHAKE128 and SHAKE256 #87099
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, cryptographic-docs-impact, 8.0.0
  • Clone files on OSX-like platforms when possible, instead of copying the whole file #79243
    area-System.IO, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-staging] Fix creating cultures with extensions in the name #87152
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Globalization, 7.0.x
  • Restore removed API from Extensions #85846
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging
  • [API Proposal]: Add overload for EventSource primitives #83751
    api-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Upgrade to LLVM 16, and stop focusing on C++11 ABI stuff from CentOS 7 #87190
    blocked, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Change the stresslog message layout to support extra-large modules and modules loaded at far-apart addresses that use the stresslog #83855
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix trim analyzer warning for inferred type arguments #87156
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fixes and improvements: #87218
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Upgrading Vector256/512 Shuffle() with VBMI support #87083
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Add Support For Multiplexing `System.Diagnostics.Metrics` for `Dotnet Monitor` and `Dotnet Counters` #86504
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • Expose IUtf8SpanParsable and implement it on the primitive numeric types #86875
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Handle different SIMD moves in peephole optimization #85875
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update System.CommandLine version #84229
    NO-MERGE, area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][tasks] Extract EmitWasmBundle into generic EmitBundle task and enable bundling in mono self-contained library #84191
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Combine two table lookups into one while formatting Guid on Arm64 #87126
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add managed entry points for raising Contention events #87087
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • ApplyStartupHook diagnostic IPC command #86813
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Eliminate cancellation deadlock in RateLimiter implementations #85523
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • [WIP] System.Linq.Expressions.Interpreter.CallInstruction creation should respect IsDynamicCodeSupported #86758
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • Reimplement NegotiateStream using (mostly) public NegotiateAuthenticaton API #86948
    area-System.Net.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] GC, threadpool and some JS interop improvements #86759
    arch-wasm, area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Block calls into managed code after a runtime assert #87043
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Add Keyed Services Support to Dependency Injection #87183
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, api-ready-for-review
  • Optimize nullcheck for Interlocked.* operations #87297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Import isinst Nullable as underlying type #87241
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wip][nativeaot][tests] Add smoke runtime tests for Native AOT on iOS #87260
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [browser] Unify boot config schema #86255
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] #76881 internal properties in GetRuntimeProperties are not shown #87175
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Reflection, 7.0.x
  • [mono] Add conditional substitution for IsDynamicCodeSupported when targeting ios-like platforms #86971
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios
  • [browser] Don't update downlevel runtime packs when producing prerelease version #87281
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix a couple of issues related to Process.WaitForExit on Unix #87174
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • [Release/6.0][PERF]Forced Urllib to specific version and removed force-reinstall per (#87286) #87289
    area-Infrastructure
  • [Release/7.0][PERF] Backport urllib fix to release/7.0 #87286
    area-Infrastructure
  • WIP don't set mark array bits during concurrent marking #87261
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm] Enable `System.Text.Json` tests AOT #87256
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
